Module kivakit.serialization.gson
Package com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson

Class PrimitiveGsonSerializer<T,​Primitive>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson.PrimitiveGsonSerializer<T,​Primitive>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T>, JsonSerializerDeserializer<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CountGsonSerializer, LocalTimeGsonSerializer, ProblemGsonSerializer, TimeInMillisecondsGsonSerializer, UtcTimeInKivaKitFormatGsonSerializer
public abstract class PrimitiveGsonSerializer<T,​Primitive> extends Object implements JsonSerializerDeserializer<T>
Serializer base class for implementing Gson serialization and deserialization of primitive types. Subclasses must override toPrimitive(Object) and toObject(Object).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
JsonSerializer, JsonDeserializer
